text:
On the final day of the event to revitalize Enoshima,
"Local Heroes Assemble in Enoshima"—

[Player] had an appointment with a certain person
on Enoshima Beach at night.

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san~!
Over here~!

options.text: Did I make you wait, perhaps?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not at all!
I just finished preparing myself!

text:
Yohack seemed to have been swimming earlier,
as water was dripping from his entire fur.

name: Yohack
text:
Ehehe!
I wanted to confirm something,
so I went for a swim!

name: Yohack
text:
How is it?
When wet, my fur shrinks,
and I look quite toned, right!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right!
I'm quite muscular, you know!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh!?
Th-That can't be true...!
Please take a closer look!

text:
While having such idle conversation,
[Player] and Yohack walked side
by side along Enoshima Beach.

name: Yohack
text:
Many things happened this time too, but
now that it's over, it feels like it was just a moment,
it's kind of strange, isn't it?

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san, you have helped me
even more than in Clouge...

name: Yohack
text:
You kindly encouraged me,
and always supported me by my side,
which was incredibly reassuring.

options.text: Because, Yohack-san, that's what you have always done.
I also got energy from you, Yohack-san.

name: Yohack
text:
Ehehe!
[Player]-san, when you say that...

name: Yohack
text:
I feel like I'm getting closer
to the hero I wanted to be, little by little!

Yohack, while talking with [Player],
thought of his locksmith master.

name: Yohack
text:
...My locksmith master
was the first "hero"
I ever met.

name: Yohack
text:
He rescued me from the darkness,
when I was trapped in a spaceship,
scared and crying alone.

name: Yohack
text:
At that time, I also couldn't see an exit,
but I didn't want to complain...
I was at a loss for what to do.

name: Yohack
text:
...But, [Player]-san, you pulled me out
of the darkness.

name: Yohack
text:
That made me very happy,
and it was so cool seeing it happen.
"You're just like a hero", I thought.
Yohack, who paused there, smiled at [Player].

name: Yohack
text:
...[Player]-san!
Will you let me transform
into the suit from that time?

name: Yohack
text:
There's something I absolutely want to do
in that form you observed for me.

Upon [Player]'s approval,
Yohack was enveloped in a dazzling light,
and transformed into a lifeguard-like figure.

Behind him,
a jet ski Parallel Weapon floated by,
as if it was waiting for him to board.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Ehehe!
Thank you for observing this form again!

options.text: You're fluffier and cuter than usual!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm a little embarrassed, but I'm so happy to hear you say that!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Because this is the form you have observed for me, [Player]-san.

options.text: You look really cool, just like a lifeguard!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: I'm a little embarrassed, but I'm so happy to hear you say that!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Because this is the form you have observed for me, [Player]-san.

options.text: Looking at it again, it's daring...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so!?
I didn't really ever think about it myself...!

text:
Yohack paused there, and opened
his mouth, looking somewhat embarrassed.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Actually, Saotome-san
told me...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
There's a perfect spot to watch
fireworks a little offshore!
If you'd like, why don't we go together?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I thought it would be wonderful
to watch fireworks alone with you, [Player]-san!

Yohack, hearing the reply,
smiled shyly and
reached out his hand to [Player].

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Come, take my hand!
I'll guide you
to that wonderful spot!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
And [Player]-san,
to avoid falling into the sea,
please hold on tight!

Taking the outstretched hand,
Yohack seated [Player] behind him.

As they pressed close together,
his rich fur and fluffy tail
tickled [Player]'s face.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe...
Being this close, it makes my heart pound, but it also feels calming...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa—!
It tickles a little, but if you really wanted to touch it...!

text:
And the two arrived at their destination,
pressing close together on the jet ski.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
It seems it's almost time.
Ah, over there—

Where Yohack pointed,
a large firework exploded.

The colorful lights
dyed Yohack's white fur
with the colors of the fireworks.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
...It's incredibly beautiful.
I'm glad I could see this view
with you like this.

Yohack, who muttered that, his round eyes
were not gazing at the fireworks
in the night sky, but at [Player].

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]-san.
I feel like I realized something important
while fighting alongside you.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
When I'm worried about someone,
someone else is surely worried about me.
...I realized that I'm not alone.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
At that time, you encouraged me,
and supported me by my side,
which made me truly happy.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
That's why, this time, I
want to support you, [Player]-san...!

Yohack, who paused there, clenched his trembling fist.
And then, he opened his mouth again.

Because he believed that his soft heart
would surely be accepted.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I want to support
you this time.
Forever...!

options.text: If we support each other, we can surely do anything.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]-san...
To think you would truly say that...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
...Actually, I was a little scared.
I wondered if I was making
a very selfish request.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
But, I also thought this:
My request might be selfish, but...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Maybe it's okay to be
selfish sometimes.

To Yohack, who smiled mischievously,
[Player]—

note:
This choice will set a flag for the rest of the story.
I apologize for not coming up with a more elegant design.
